column3: Traffic; Preah Sihanouk: According to ------reports------ on August 9
column5: all citizens who are traveling along National Road 45 must be alert after a stretch of the road collapsed at kilometer 8 In Oong village
column8: Preah Sihanouk.------There will be severe traffic jams
column9: and heavy trucks will be prevented from using the road until it is repaired.
